entries.description: Introduce `DisableAdminKubeconfig` flag in `KubermaticSettings` to disable the admin kubeconfig feature from dashboard.
Add Cilium 1.13.7 as supported CNI version, deprecate Cilium version 1.13.6 as it's impacted by CVE-2023-39347, CVE-2023-41333 (Moderate Severity), CVE-2023-41332 (Low Severity).
Operating system profile is configured correctly when updating a MachineDeployment now.
Fix logout failing when Keycloak is used as identity provider.
